titleStmt.title: P. Oxy. 9 1169. Gospel Fragment, Mt 6, passim

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Fixed divs and added reg tag to flesh side, col. i, 2-3
Finalized - Fixed divs and added reg tag to flesh side, col. i, 2-3

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Please implement the following changes. Delete vol. 9. Add Van Haelst catalogue number, which is biblio 8932 no. 344 Move Gregory-Aland from “General Notes” to here: biblio number is 6323, catalog number is 0170. Delete Legacy Display Name and revise display name. Author: TLG number = 0031. Geo reference: add pleiades URI to geo reference for Oxyrhynchus https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983. Text: change to hair side. Everywhere lost.?in should be changed to lost.?lin. Hair side, col. i: 1. → [.?][απέ]χουσιν; 4. → σὺ. Col. ii: 2. → (π̅(ατ)ὴ̅ρ̅); → [.?]. 7. → οὕτως. 9. → (π̅(άτ)ε̅ρ̅) . 10.--> (ο̅ὐ̅(ρα)ν̅ο̅ῖ̅ς̅). 12. Complete the word in the lacuna, i.e., ἐλ 13.- [θέτω]. Flesh side, col. i, 1. [.?][εἰσενέγ]. 2.- κῃς. 5. → ἐάν. 6. → (ἀ̣ν(θρώπ)οις). 9. (π̅(ατ)ὴ̅ρ̅). 10. (ο̣̅ὐ̣̅(ρά)ν̣̅ι̣̅ο̣̅ς̣̅). 11. ἐὰν. Col ii, 1. → σὺ
